publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2857# John Scott: Importation of Putrescible Waste to Scottish Landfill Sites—That the Parliament recognises the rights of landfill site operators to use their sites as licensed, but nonetheless notes with concern the intention of some local authorities in Northern Ireland to use Scottish landfill sites for dumping their putrescible waste, and further recognises that in the long term this is likely to impact adversely on Scottish council tax payers, as Scottish landfill resources are used up by non-Scottish local authorities using Scotland as their dumping ground.
